definition: remaining quantity/reserves (of natural resources, oil etc)
to store/to save/to have in reserve/heir/Taiwan pr. [chu2]
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: The region may hold 2 quadrillion cubic feet of natural gas.
sentences.chinese: 該地區的天然氣儲量可能達2千萬億立方英尺。

sentences.english: Gas diffusion makes reserves of gas reservoirs decrease and exhaustion.
sentences.chinese: 天然氣擴散作用使氣藏儲量逐漸減小，以至估竭。

sentences.english: The Tyumen region has even greater reserves.
sentences.chinese: 秋明油田甚至擁有更大的儲量。

sentences.english: The fuel bank with capacity of 108 kg of petrol, is located in the upper part of the cabin.
sentences.chinese: 108千克儲量的油箱位於駕駛室頂部。

sentences.english: China has just started the study on coalbed methane (CBM) reserves.
sentences.chinese: 煤層氣儲量的研究工作纔剛剛開始。

sentences.english: Conjugate gradient methods are famous for their interation simplicity and low memory requirements.
sentences.chinese: 共軛梯度法以其迭代簡單，存儲量低著稱。

sentences.english: The carbon in forests exceeds the amount of carbon currently in the atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 森林中的碳儲量超過目前大氣的含碳量。

sentences.english: Coal reserves of 27 million tons above, mercury for heavy deposit.
sentences.chinese: 煤炭儲量2700萬噸以上，汞爲萬噸級特大礦牀。

sentences.english: Shandong has extensive petroleum deposits in Dongying.
sentences.chinese: 在山東省的東瀛市擁有豐富的石油儲量。

sentences.english: There is a large reserves of metakaolin in china, which is widely used in various industries.
sentences.chinese: 我國高嶺土儲量很大，目前被廣泛應用於各種行業中。

sentences.english: Although China currently monopolizes rare earth mining, other countries have deposits too.
sentences.chinese: 儘管中國現在壟斷了稀土採礦業，其它國家也有儲量。

sentences.english: Its geological reserve approximately composes our country gas reserves 70%. As the influence of water influx aggravates gradually.
sentences.chinese: 在我國，其地質儲量約佔我國天然氣儲量的70%。

sentences.english: Its geological reserve approximately composes our country gas reserves 70%. As the influence of water influx aggravates gradually.
sentences.chinese: 在我國，其地質儲量約佔我國天然氣儲量的70%。

sentences.english: The bentonite in coal series is very rich.
sentences.chinese: 煤系地層中膨潤土儲量相當豐富，絕大部分品質優良。

sentences.english: Rumaila's reserves are estimated at close to 18bn barrels.
sentences.chinese: 魯邁拉油田的儲量估計接近180億桶。

sentences.english: China has 48 percent of the world's reserves; the United States has 13 percent.
sentences.chinese: 中國佔了世界48%的儲量，美國佔13%。

definition: to extract (ore or other resource from a mine)/to exploit/to mine
